eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.jackson

Class SemTextModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.Module
      • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule
        • eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.jackson.SemTextModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.core.Versioned, Serializable

    public final class SemTextModule
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule
    A module for handling semtext objects with Jackson JSON serialization framework. In order to work properly the module needs you to register also OdtCommonModule and GuavaModule (both are in separate maven packages). For properly deserializing metadata you also need to register it by calling registerMetadata(java.lang.Class, java.lang.String, java.lang.Class)
    Author:
    David Leoni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static void registerModulesInto(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper om)

      • registerMetadata

        public static <T> void registerMetadata(Class<? extends eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.HasMetadata> hasMetadataClass,
                        String namespace,
                        Class<T> metadataClass)
        Registers the provided namespace to the corresponding metadata class, so Jackson will know how to deserialize objects under that namespace. The mapping will be valid only for the specified metadata holder class. NOTE: If your class has generics (like List) , use registerMetadata(java.lang.Class, java.lang.String, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference) instead.
        Parameters:
        hasMetadataClass - Either SemText, Sentence, Term or Meaning
        namespace - a non-empty string
        metadataClass - any class that Jackson can serialize and deserialize.

      • registerMetadata

        public static void registerMetadata(Class<? extends eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.HasMetadata> hasMetadataClass,
                    String namespace,
                    com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference metadataClass)
        Registers the provided namespace to the corresponding metadata type reference, so Jackson will know how to deserialize objects under that namespace. The mapping will be valid only for the specified metadata holder class.
        Parameters:
        hasMetadataClass - Either SemText, Sentence, Term or Meaning
        namespace - a non-empty string
        metadataClass - any class that Jackson can serialize and deserialize.

      • getMetadataNamespaces

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> getMetadataNamespaces(Class<? extends eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.HasMetadata> hasMetadataClass)
        Returns the namespaces registered for the given class that can hold metadata. If nothing is found an empty set is returned.
        Parameters:
        hasMetadataClass - Either SemText, Sentence, Term or Meaning

      • getMetadataTypeReference

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference getMetadataTypeReference(Class<? extends eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.HasMetadata> hasMetadataClass,
                                                                     String namespace)
        Returns the jacksonizable class associated to the provided class that can hold metadata and namespace
        Parameters:
        hasMetadataClass - Either SemText, Sentence, Term or Meaning
        namespace - a registered namespace
        Throws:
        eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.NotFoundException - if the namespace was not registered
